哭喪.definition: to wail at a funeral; formal wailing while offering sacrifice to the departed

哭喪棒.definition: mourning staff draped in white, held at a funeral to show filial piety

哭喪著臉.definition: to pull a long face; to wear a mournful expression

哭天抹淚.definition: to wail and whine; piteous weeping

哭得死去活來.pinyin: ku1 de5 si3 qu4 huo2 lai2

哭窮.definition: to bewail one's poverty; to complain about being hard up; to pretend to be poor

哭笑不得.definition: lit. not to know whether to laugh or cry (idiom); both funny and extremely embarrassing; between laughter and tears

哭腔.definition: sobbing tone; sob; dirge; opera tune portraying mourning

哭訴.definition: to lament; to complain tearfully; to wail accusingly

哭靈.definition: to weep before a coffin or a memorial to the dead
